reviews.review:
Un juego que en su totalidad te llena de adrenalina y emocion, en mi opinion un juego que con amigos se disfruta mucho mas pudiendo llevar al limite las mecanicas y explorar el dinamismo que posee.
Horas y horas de risa me lleve jugando con mis amigos, y una adrenalina emocionante que mas de una vez nos hizo gritar.
Este en oferta o no, no dejes pasar este juego, mas aun si tienes alguien con quien compartir la prueba del superviviente
"Juego 8/10"
agarre una fobia a las linternas
Best and worst game I've ever played. I strongly recommend this bug.

mmr bad. devs are noobs and balanced mmr around casuals, also they overnerf bc they are idiots and have made so many killers unfun and bad, performance is also bad graphic customization is REALLY limited in this game probably the most limited ive ever seen in any game ALSO there are a TON of cheaters, exploiters, and macro abusers that never get punished so thats cool too

es un juego donde la comunidad es exelente, bien diseñado, no presenta errores y un gran  sistema de balanceo..
¡mentira!
vas a renegar, reirte, trolear, a veces gritar, vas a querer tirar todo a la mierda, pero vas a volver a jugar XD
si ves un generador, reparalo mirando a tu a todos lados, hay asesinos q no hacen ruido y te asustan, lo he vivido
si ves un totem rompelo, si ves cofres abrilos. 
si ves q cuelgan a un compañelo ANDA A SACARLO DEL GANCHO, me ha pasado de estar horas ahi tirado y hasta morir xq no iba nadie
en si, es un juego q al principio te perdes, pero a medida q vas jugando te va atrapando y te divertis
FPS不到10是什么感觉？修机疯狂炸机。追人的时候鬼影迷踪
Killers can hit you through windows which is bullshit
Ye pretty fun you kill or run away and make generator go brrrrrrrrrrr aidjnoawdfnaowdal brrrrr TIng
whatever you do avoid the community server its cringe and filled with furries
逃跑是不可能逃跑的，这辈子都不可能逃跑的。救人又不会，只能靠摸摸电机赚点分维持生活这样子。被挂上树就像回家一样，感觉比外面好多了！这里的屠夫各个都是人才，说话又好听，我超喜欢这里的。

Gameplay is fun, especially with friends. DLC franchise characters are awesome but have limited cosmetics.

Has the most toxic playerbase that I have ever seen.

Não tem penalidade pra quem quita, a lenda dos games kkkjj
Edit: agora o jogo te desconecta e dá penalidade por ter desconectado. muito bom usahushuas

After getting some skill, and q-ing with buddies, [b] this is one of the cutest game you can play [/b] hearing your friends scream in terror, as a survivor getting carried, or custom games giving them something sweet to dream about at night. 

[h1] DBD is <3 [/h1]

Also [spoiler] SHADOWJAKE ARMY IS THE BEST [/spoiler]
เล่นสนุกดี ช่วงแรกๆจะร้อนๆหน่อย อดทนเล่นไป
I like this game because it's awesome
真的是现在最喜欢的一款游戏，玩逃生时有时碰到一些友好的杀手把我放了：）所以我玩杀手也一直很佛系的hhh，动不动就三跑四跑的（除了有一些喜欢嘲讽的求生我可能会选择给献祭了）总之希望Dead By Daylight越做越好>0<
This game is amazing, i freakin love it.

buglarını saymazsak oyun %10 oynanabilir <3
if we don't count bugs then the game is playable %10
jogo muito legal pra jogar entre amigos, a parte ruim é nao ter chat de voz entre os sobreviventes

They finally made some much needed changes and I am a lot more happy now.  If they can now just do some type or bonus content for people who have played consistently for years would be nice.  I mean we spend the money so why not do something special to let us know you care about the repeat, year after year player.
Great game. But if you playing against a freddie please leave the game. Freddie is toxic.
pretty fun for the most part
Play this on xbox more than pc but regardless what you play this game on it is amazing.

If you're into multiplayer, team work games, this game is a perfect fit for you. Great replayability with the various killers in each session. There are some glitches, and the game has been catered to the killers winning, but that creates a good an fun challenge for the survivors.
eh mto bom, mas o meu pc eh ruim e trava ;-; e talvez poderiam colocar um dead by daylight lite ne
Es un buen juego, tiene muchas formas de jugar, lo mejor es que puedes jugar como asesino o como sobreviviente, y dependiendo de lo que elijas tienes varias opciones, en verdad que si lo recomiendo.

El juego esta bueno pero es muy dificil ganar de sobreviviente cuando sos nuevopor lo menos. me doy cuenta porque de asesino mato a muchos q son mejor en nivel que yo yo siendo un novato, y de sobreviviente es muy dificil.

Had this game on the ps4 first, but I also have friends that play this on the pc so I decided to get it from steam. The game runs smoothly and it is pretty fun. You can get some jumpscares whenever you are playing against stealthy killers (I know I have). Each killer has their own chase music, some are scarier than others, and some come from their iconic movies (Ghostface, Michael Myers, Demogorgon, etc). Updates do not take long to download/copy.
This game is against survivors! If you want to play as a killer it is great. Game sucks for survivors now.
Um ótimo jogo para jogar com os amigos tensão e risadas são inevitáveis no geral um jogo muito divertido.

Kanser ruslar her oyunda olduğu gibi bunun da içine sıçıyolar. Tünelliyolar, campliyolar bi de üstüne küfrediyolar. Burdan kanser oyuncuların annelerine selam söylüyorum. Bunlara rağmen güzel oyun, öneririm.
I think it is a very intersting game.
Es un juego muy bueno y muy entretenido, diria que un o de los mejores. El unico pero que se le pondria es el de sus jugadores, aveces te toca jugar con personas algo toxicas.
its god but t has a lot of updats
This game is fun and will keep you on edge. There are some problems with bugs and glitches at times.
get hit through window and pallet
solid gamed loved playing on ps4 playing on pc 100x better would recommend to anyone
Great Game. Has ups and downs but hey what's new :) Would recommend!
Aint no other game like Dead By Daylight, BIG UP FOG WHISPERS
If you feel like you dont like this game give it some time watch some videos get the understanding then play again and enjoy (alos try a controller)

When first playing, the game can be fun as a horror game, but once you have a better understanding, it becomes a well balanced competative game with skill playing a big part. Overall it is a great game that devs continue to update/improve even years later. Good investment for $20
a great game that give you potential to be better
pretty ok. steep learning curve and the community can be pretty toxic. but 10/10 will keep

muito top, apesar de eu não ter placa de video ainda roda bem no low

(june 2020)i hate the spirit and doctor but other than that 10/10
